message.content:
A cornet is a musical instrument, similar to a trumpet, which produces a mellow tone.
It is typically made of brass and has a conical shape.
The instrument is usually around 12-15 inches long and has three valves.
The bell of a cornet is flared and has a rim diameter of about 5 inches.
The instrument produces sound through a small mouthpiece, which is held with the lips.
Cornets are commonly used in brass bands, jazz ensembles, and orchestras.
They can be found in music stores and online retailers.
